abstract: Joseph Sledge is released from North Carolina prison after serving nearly 40 years for two 1976 murders he did not commit.
lead_paragraph: A man wrongly convicted of the 1976 stabbing deaths of a woman and her daughter left prison Friday after he was found innocent by a three-judge panel.
snippet: A man wrongly convicted of the 1976 stabbing deaths of a woman and her daughter left prison Friday after he was found innocent by a three-judge panel.

headline.main: North Carolina: DNA Evidence Brings Freedom for Man in Prison Since 1976
